Comments_List: A all-round knowledge about the basics of the universe and what is in the course of astronomy
Basic knowledge about astronomy and skills.
I learned astronomy in an effective way in this class

I learned the formation of the planets and stars and several ways to discover the exo-planets. I had an opportunity to observe the sun's spectrum and watched marvellous star shows and they gave the sense how painstakingly beautiful the universe actually is.
Basic knowledge about the universe; how it is created; how the stars form and how they will evolve eventually.
Knowing more about planets and stars
Should be made more obvious in the description of the course that the physics and math involved/taught is relatively hard for those with little physics knowledge
The structure is very clear, but due to some limitations, there was no opportunity of hand-on experience.
